Articles.Content: SPACE ENGINEERS NOW HAS 100% MORE OXYGEN! NOW WE CAN REMOVE HELMETS! caps

Yes, Space Engineers is getting more and more features as well.

Is there any word on joystick-support? I'm dying to have that added!

> 
> Yes, Space Engineers is getting more and more features as well.
> Is there any word on joystick-support? I'm dying to have that added!

no, but planets already confirmed, along with new 3D models for all blocks

It's not that impassive currently. It's literally just a room checking script coupled with some particle effects.

But when air drag and movement come out, it will be a different story. Also, we need a use for pressurized environments.
